results.name: A Book of Secrets and Regret (Beta)
How to be a Halloween pumpkin

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or OpenGL 2.0 compatible GPU with at least 512 MB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or OpenGL 4.1 compatible GPU with at least 1 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 160 MB available space

results.name: The Statement of Randolph Carter (luwis, UltraShiko, Binong)
